message.content: {"id": "6304", "title": "Bug 6304 - Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource", "description": "", "OB": "When selecting a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer and opening the context menu, the 'Team' entry is missing. However, it should be present.", "EB": "When selecting a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer and opening the context menu, the 'Team' entry is not present. It should be visible.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue: 1. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer. 2. Open the context menu."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
